ThingDef.Name: ElfBase
ThingDef.label: ElfBase leather
ThingDef.description: Tanned, dried, scraped ElfBase skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.

ThingDef.label: Kobold skin
ThingDef.description: The tanned skin of a Kobold. Kobold hide is reasonably tough, but does not insulate well at all..
